title: LF Dia+ Top & Jungle for serious team. Trials tonight.
body:
**Looking for Diamond+ Junglers and Top laners to join a serious ranked team.**

* Must have experience.
* Must have Teamspeak 3.
* Must be able to practice 2-3 nights a week (2-3 hours each of those nights).
* Must be able to watch reply footage with team via Skype/Teamspeak to analyse games.
* Preferably mained the same role in Season 4. However, not needed.
* Be over the age of 18, for maturity reasons mostly.

*Obviously, no negative attitude or one trick ponies or Solo Queue heroes, that should go without saying.*

**We will be running some trials tonight, and over the next couple of days.**

**Current roster**

**Top:**
**Jungle:**
**Mid:** The Matrix
**ADC:** Ariez
**Support:** Makkam

**Feel free to add me in-game or leave a comment. **

*Makkam*

replies.body:
Dear Makkam

i have started to make a esports team currently with challenger players. would you be interested in combining our teams to make 1 team and manage together? contact me at Synergy Gaming. https://www.facebook.com/pages/Synergy-Gaming/810423799051087

I could play on sunday, for two hours.
How ever i'm stuck in bronze,  bronze 2.
Is it alright if i could tag along with you guys, i am also under 18.
I can play most positions, however i like to play adc,mid and top.
My summoner name is Fishay.
